name: World of Warships: Legends — Building a Navy
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Building a Navy
description:
Even the mightiest fleets need well-trained crews!

Start readying yourself for battle with perfect training cruiser Katori plus a bunch of loot! In the "Building a Navy" pack, you'll get:

- Tier II сruiser Katori - 7 days of Premium Account - 150,000 Credits - 30x Type 1 Camouflages - 30x Type 4 Camouflages - 30x Rare Ship XP Boosters - 30x Rare Credit Boosters - 30x Rare Commander XP Boosters - 30x Rare Global XP Boosters - 30x Rare Battle Boosters - 37,000 Commander XP

If you already have Katori in your Port, you'll receive compensation in the form of 1,500,000 Credits. Content such as Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., only become visible after reaching a specific account level in the game.
